metadata.authors: Ricky Fok, Izzy Qian, Grant Rinehimer
metadata.description: These generated results are a product of Autolab by Altum Labs. It contains private data and is not for distribution. Unauthorized use of this data for any other purposes is strictly prohibited.

summary: The goal of this lab is to demonstrate the setup and equipment available in the wet lab space for performing eye-related experiments.

procedure.step: Ensure that the wet lab space has shelves for storage of instruments and supplies, a sink for utensil cleaning, and a few hoods for ventilation.
Prepare a fixative for the anterior capsule to reduce elasticity, if needed.
Prepare fixatives for injection into limbs to induce cataracts, if desired.
Use the microwave to induce a cataract in a large eye, and store it in the mini fridge.
Set up the work table with an operating microscope and teaching scope for instructional purposes.
Lay out all the necessary instruments on the table.
Use a foam head to secure the pig eye, pinning it down with pens at the approximate location of the rectus muscles.
